brief: Make all the buttons and tabs functional in the markdown to HTML converter page.
checks: The page must load with the markdown input area visible by default
The #markdown-tabs must switch between the original Markdown and the rendered HTML
The #markdown-output must update when the #markdown-source changes
Add a button to preview the rendered HTML in a new tab
It must have two sections: #markdown-input and #HTML-output
It must have a button to convert markdown to HTML
